metadata.title: CVE-2021-21374 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Nimble is a package manager for the Nim programming language. In Nimrelease versions before versions 1.2.10 and 1.4.4, "nimble refresh" fetchesa list of Nimble packages over HTTPS without full verification of theSSL/TLS certificate due to the default setting of httpClient. An attackerable to perform MitM can deliver a modified package list containingmalicious software packages. If the packages are installed and used theattack escalates to untrusted code execution.

criterions.comment: nim package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
